channel.title: Leeching messages
channel.description:
Basically i want to add leeching text both ways meaning when i leech them it tells me that i have.
it allready tells them when they have been leeched however tell me what im doing wrong
[code]c2.sendMessage("Your attack has been leeched by " +Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!"); c.sendMessage("You Leech Your Opponants Defence " +Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!");[/code]

Basically i want to add leeching text both ways
